Question
========
Given Positron is still evolving, what is one recommended way to keep learning and contribute?

Answerlist
----------
* Follow the Positron blog/webinars and consider contributing improvements to the docs
* Wait for a printed manual before using new features
* Ignore updates until Positron leaves beta
* Disable all online resources to avoid changes

Solution
========
Staying current with blog tips, webinars, and even contributing documentation helps you learn as Positron evolves.

Answerlist

* True
* False

* False
